mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.fangjian_id as fangjianId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.fnagjian_yuye_time as fnagjianYuyeTime ,a.fnagjian_yuye_text as fnagjianYuyeText ,a.fnagjian_tiwen as fnagjianTiwen ,a.fnagjian_text as fnagjianText ,a.fnagjian_yuye_yesno_types as fnagjianYuyeYesnoTypes ,a.fnagjian_yuye_yesno_text as fnagjianYuyeYesnoText ,a.create_time as createTime
